channel.title: hotel chain on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in hotel chain on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Aloft Hotels Logo
Aloft Hotels is a hotel chain based in North America, owned by Marriott International. The first hotel opened at the Trudeau International Airport in Montreal in 2008. Aloft Hotels have since opened across North America and internationally. Most Aloft hotels are located in city centers or in close proximity to airports. As of June 30, 2020, the chain had 183 hotels with 30,660 rooms. The brand is most notable for its modern architecture design style.
You can download theAloftlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Aloft
item.description: Aloft Hotels is a hotel chain based in North America, owned by Marriott International. The first hotel opened at the Trudeau International Airport in Montreal in 2008. Aloft Hotels have since opened across North America and internationally. Most Aloft hotels are located in city centers or in close proximity to airports. As of June 30, 2020, the chain had 183 hotels with 30,660 rooms. The brand is most notable for its modern architecture design style.
